summary: Feature request to add `workerShuttingDown` promise and `workerShuttingDownSignal` abort signal to ActivityContext in TypeScript SDK, matching functionality available in other Temporal SDKs (Go, Python, .NET) to detect worker shutdown before grace period expiration.
userImpact: Activities in TypeScript SDK cannot be notified of impending worker shutdown, limiting graceful cleanup capabilities compared to other SDK languages.
proposedFix: Add `workerShuttingDown: Promise<never>` and `workerShuttingDownSignal: AbortSignal` properties to ActivityContext, similar to cancellation handling, with matching top-level exports on activity/index.ts
keyQuote: Other SDKs expose a way on activity context to know that a Worker is shutting down, before expiration of the grace period. TS doesn't.
